name: digital-vault-website
description: Digital Vault - Secure file storage and management system

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist
scripts.clean:win:
if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules && if exist frontend
ode_modules rmdir /s /q frontend
ode_modules && if exist backend
ode_modules rmdir /s /q backend
ode_modules && if exist frontend\dist rmdir /s /q frontend\dist && if exist backend\dist rmdir /s /q backend\dist
